column1: Uchi////Just a general warning against their valet service.  If your car is not worth over $50k
column2: they will park it in the mud lot.  My husband's front bumper was caked with mud.  After washing it
column3: he discovered they had scratched and dented his bumper.  They had dented the rear of my car and cracked the rear light.  You can try to park your car yourself on the street
column4: but good luck finding a spot.  Or you can go to Kata Robata.  The food is just as good
column5: and they have ample parking without classism.
